posts.post_content:
Hard to price this one.  No sales ever in VCP, and very nice for the grade.  There are three copies of this card in the Pop Reports (this one, PSA 4, SGC 3) 

$545 shipped and insured (within the US and with no-fee payment method)

I will listen to offers, but I won't accept any for the first 48 hours while I see if it will sell at my list price.  Thanks for looking!
